description:
Circus of TimTim is a Stealth Horror Survival Game about two siblings trying to sneak inside the most hunted carnival of all time to recover lost items with a metal detector device, however 

Features
•	Use tools to lead you to your next objective - but careful as enemies can hear the beep!
•	Explore the ruins and death of what was once a fun-family circus!
•	Make sure not to get lost in it's beauty, because it can be deadly.
•	Explore the insides of every corner of the carnival and leave no stone unturned!
•	Find items that can help you in the circus.
name: Circus of TimTim
